# Setup

```{r}
# Libraries
library(foreach)
library(doMC)

# Backend
registerDoMC(3)
x <- iris[which(iris[,5] != "setosa"), c(1,5)]
trials <- 1000
```

# Iris

Check it's working:

```{r}
getDoParWorkers()
```

No threading:

```{r}
ptime <- system.time({
  r <- foreach(icount(trials), .combine=cbind) %dopar% {
    ind <- sample(100, 100, replace=TRUE)
    result1 <- glm(x[ind,2]~x[ind,1], family=binomial(logit))
    coefficients(result1)
  }
})[3]
print(ptime)
```

Threading:

```{r}
ptime <- system.time({
  r <- foreach(icount(trials), .combine=cbind) %dopar% {
    ind <- sample(100, 100, replace=TRUE)
    result1 <- glm(x[ind,2]~x[ind,1], family=binomial(logit))
    coefficients(result1)
  }
})[3]
print(ptime)
```
